rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with wide doorway and ramp leading to the main living areas. Vastu compliant placement for auspicious entry.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious industrial-style open space with exposed structural elements, adaptable seating area and flexible layout suitable for entertaining guests. Large windows ensure natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with soundproofing and ample storage. Located at a north-east corner to encourage productivity per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Industrial kitchen design featuring durable finishes and modular cabinetry. Optimally placed for efficient workflow and natural ventilation as advised by Vastu.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary sleeping area with attached ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Positioned in the south-west region of the layout to promote calm energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for guest use or family member; features built-in storage and integrated lighting. Vastu considerations include placement in the north-west area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom with minimalistic design for additional family use; placed towards the east to harness morning light and energy as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Utility/Bathroom
rooms.description: Dedicated utility space including bathrooms for guests. Designed with accessibility features such as grab bars and non-slip flooring.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible door with automatic opener installed at the main entrance.

openings.name: Side Windows
openings.description: Multiple large windows on the living room walls to enhance natural light and ventilation in line with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Glass Partition
openings.description: Industrial style glass partition separating home office from the living area to allow visual connectivity while maintaining acoustical privacy.

openings.name: Sliding Doors
openings.description: Modern sliding doors connecting the kitchen with dining or living areas for seamless transition and accessibility.
